p.e:
I FEAR THE MASTER HAS STEERED US
WRONG.  THE EXPERIMENTS, THE
ERRORS IN JUDGEMENT. . .

NOW THE WARNING SIGNS FLASH
BEFORE ME YET IT IS TOO LATE.

THERE ARE. . .  THINGS. . . COMING FOR US.
I HAVE NOT SEEN THEM WITH MY OWN
EYES BUT THEY ARE HERE.


YOU MUST REMEMBER THE PROPER
RITUALS!
REALITY IS AN ILLUSION. DISPEL IT!
THIS DAGGER WILL REVEAL THE KEY
TO DOING SO, AND ONLY THAT.

-- C.
